com.tambapps.fft4j.carray2d

Class CArray2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tambapps.fft4j.carray2d.CArray2D

  • public class CArray2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A complex 2-dimensional array of size M, N.
    M is the number of rows, N is the number of columns

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CArray2D(int M, int N)
      Creates a 2D array of size M, N
      CArray2D(int M, int N, Complex[] values)
      Creates a 2D array of size M, N with the given values.
